mapper.select: select l.id, l.c_createDate, l.n_creater, l.c_loginIp,u.c_username from loginrecord l,users u where l.n_creater = u.id order by id limit #{page.index},#{page.rows}
mapper.insert: insert into loginrecord( c_createDate, n_creater, c_loginIp) values(#{c_createDate},#{n_creater},#{c_loginIp})
